plugin.name: memcached
plugin.author: Andres Almiray
plugin.title: Memcached support
plugin.description: Memcached support via several clients - Java Memcached Client -> http://github.com/gwhalin/Memcached-Java-Client - XMemcachedClient -> http://code.google.com/p/xmemcached - Spymemcached -> http://code.google.com/p/spymemcached
